title: Wicked Werewolf Secret
description: Kole Smith will soon become the leader of his pack, and not just any pack. He will lead the Royal Guard of the Werewolf Society. Before he accepts his role, he has unfinished business and her name is Sarah.Sarahâ€™s family ran the Casino Operation used as a front for The Werewolf Society, until the greed of the rebels trying to overthrow their government led to her families murder. Kole saved her life, gave her the opportunity to live, and to deliver the vengeance she craves against the rebels.When they meet again, their passion will explode in a firestorm that will either heal the pain of the past or destroy them forever.
author: Lisa Renee Jones
